title.narrative: PA Metro Water and Sanitation Improvement Project

description.narrative: The PDO is to assist the Republic of Panamá in increasing the quality, coverage and efficiency of its water supply and sanitation services in the lower-income neighborhoods of selected areas of the Panamá Metropolitan Region.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article V 5.01 (a) | Description :The Subsidiary Agreement has been executed on behalf of the Recipient andIDAAN | Due Date :30-Sep-2010
Finance Agreement :Article V 5.01 (b) | Description :Adopt the Operation Manual satisfactory to the Bank | Due Date :30-Sep-2010
Finance Agreement :Article V 5.01 (c) | Description :The Borrower shall make the proceeds of the Loan available to IDAAN undersubsidiary Formation of the external project Unit | Due Date :30-Sep-2010
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2,I,A,2 (b) | Description :Appoint a Technical Advisor | Due Date :08-Mar-2012
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2,I,A,3 (a) | Description :Establish the Steering Committee | Due Date :30-Mar-2011
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2,I,A,3, (b) | Description :Establish the inter-institutional Committee | Due Date :30-Mar-2011
